    • Method Detail

      • createGame

        public void createGame(boolean isServer,
                       boolean isHuman,
                       java.lang.String host,
                       int port)
        This method creates either a server or client instance and calls for the first turn.
        Parameters:
        isServer - boolean indicating if instance is a server
        isHuman - boolean indicating if player is human or AI
        host - host address for the server
        port - int indicating port for serverSocket

      • isGUIDisabled

        public boolean isGUIDisabled()
        Public Accessor method for GUIDisabled
        Returns:
        boolean value of GUIDisabled attribute

      • disableGUI

        public void disableGUI()
        Simple mutator for GUIDisabled attribute to set it equal to true, disabling the GUI.

      • enableGUI

        public void enableGUI()
        Simple mutator for GUIDisabled attribute to set it equal to false, enabling the GUI.

      • handleMessage

        public void handleMessage(Connect4MoveMessage message)
        Passes a message received from the GUI to the model to perform the require update to the board with the requested move.
        Parameters:
        message - Connect4MoveMessage object containing placement and color information.

      • humanTurn

        public void humanTurn(int col)
        Executes a requested move on behalf of the human Accepts a column requested to place a token and provides that request to the model to update accordingly.
        Parameters:
        col - Column player has requested to play in

      • computerTurn

        public void computerTurn()
        Executes a move on behalf of the computer Generates a randomly generated column number that yields a VALID select and proceeds to place a token at that position.

      • hasOpenSlot

        private boolean hasOpenSlot(int column)
        Checks the given column to see if its a valid move Retrieves the board state and queries to see if the requested column is valid
        Parameters:
        column - Requested column to be validated
        Returns:
        boolean result on the validity check of move

      • closeConnections

        public void closeConnections()
        This method closes sockets connections and output streams in either the server or client, depending on which one the controller holds.

      • placeInRow

        private void placeInRow(int col)
        Places a token in the next available slot inside of the provided column.
        Parameters:
        col - Column to insert a token into

      • getValidColumn

        public int getValidColumn()
        Retrieves a valid column for the computer to make a valid selection. Returns the column index to be used for token insertion.
        Returns:
        int index of valid column, -1 if none available

      • isBoardFull

        private boolean isBoardFull()
        Checks to see if the board is currently full, i.e. there are no open slots to choose from in any column Returns true if board is full, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        boolean result of board checking

      • checkIfGameOver

        public boolean checkIfGameOver()
        Checks state of the board to see if game is over
        Returns:
        boolean result on if the game is over

      • declareWinner

        public void declareWinner()
        Declares the winner of the game Finds the winning player and passes the information along to the model to update the View with the winning and losing Alerts.

      • checkRows

        private java.lang.Integer checkRows()
        Searches all rows on the existing board to see if a winner exists. Returns winnnigId if one exists, -1 otherwise.
        Returns:
        Integer id of the winning id, -1 if none

      • checkCols

        private java.lang.Integer checkCols()
        Searches all columns on the existing board to see if a winner exists. Returns winnnigId if one exists, -1 otherwise.
        Returns:
        Integer id of the winning id, -1 if none

      • checkDiagonals

        private java.lang.Integer checkDiagonals()
        Searches all diagonals on the existing board to see if a winner exists. Returns winnnigId if one exists, -1 otherwise.
        Returns:
        Integer id of the winning id, -1 if none

      • checkRightDiagonals

        private java.lang.Integer checkRightDiagonals(int col,
                                              int row)
        Checks all right-directed diagonals on the board to determine if a winner exists Starting from the given row/col, traverse the existing board to see if a winner exists on any right-directed diagonal (i.e. row++ && col++ increments)
        Parameters:
        row - Starting row
        col - Starting column
        Returns:
        Integer id of the winning id, -1 if none

      • checkLeftDiagonals

        private java.lang.Integer checkLeftDiagonals(int col,
                                             int row)
        Checks all left-directed diagonals on the board to determine if a winner exists Starting from the given row/col, traverse the existing board to see if a winner exists on any left-directed diagonal (i.e. row-- && col-- increments)
        Parameters:
        row - Starting row
        col - Starting column
        Returns:
        Integer id of the winning id, -1 if none
